global.description: Configure global configuration of a VS.

combined-sysname-switch.description: Enable/disable allow the command line prompt of a non-admin VS to carry the system name of an admin VS.

vs-instance.description: Configure a physical router (PR) or a logical router (LR) into several VRs through hardware and software simulation, and each VR performs routing tasks independently.

name.description: Name of a virtual system. The name cannot be changed.

id.description: The VS ID is allocated by the system and cannot be changed after creation.

is-admin.description: Whether the virtual system is a management VS.

port-mode.description: Port mode of a virtual system. The port mode of the virtual system cannot be changed.

description.description: Description of a VS. It is used to describe the usage of the virtual system. The description can be empty.

resource.description: Configure the resource that is allocated to the VS.

vpn-instance-number.description: Number of VPNs allocated to the VS.

vlan-number.description: Number of VLANs allocated to the VS.

ipv4-unicast-route-number.description: Number of unicast IPv4 routes allocated to the VS.

ipv6-unicast-route-number.description: Number of unicast IPv6 routes allocated to the VS.

ipv4-multicast-route-number.description: Number of multicast IPv4 routes allocated to the VS.

ipv6-multicast-route-number.description: Number of multicast IPv6 routes allocated to the VS.

cpu-weight.description: CPU weight allocated to a VS.

memory-weight.description: Memory weight allocated to a VS.

disk-weight.description: Disk space weight allocated to a VS.

saved-state.description: Operational state of saving VS configuration.

status.description: Current running status of a VS.

vpn-instance-used-number.description: Number of VPN instances used by a VS.

vlan-used-number.description: Number of VLANs used by a VS.

ipv4-unicast-route-used-number.description: Number of unicast IPv4 routes used by a VS.

ipv6-unicast-route-used-number.description: Number of unicast IPv6 routes used by a VS.

ipv4-multicast-route-used-number.description: Number of multicast IPv4 routes used by a VS.

ipv6-multicast-route-used-number.description: Number of multicast IPv6 routes used by a VS.

physical-resource-states.description: List of the information about the use of VS physical resources.

memory-total-size.description: Total memory size of a VS.

home-folder-used-size.description: Size of the home directory used by a VS.

home-folder-total-size.description: Total size of the home directory of a VS.

logfile-folder-used-size.description: Size of the logfile directory used by a VS.

logfile-folder-total-size.description: Total size of the logfile directory of a VS.

global-resource.description: Operational state of global VS resource.

port-mode.description: VS port allocation mode, which can be port or group. For some resources, the port allocation mode is identified using '-'.

assignable-number.description: Number of VS resources that can be allocated.
